kubernetes_service_account.description: A service account provides an identity for processes that run in a Pod.

metadata.description: Standard service account's metadata. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#metadata)

image_pull_secret.description: A list of references to secrets in the same namespace to use for pulling any images in pods that reference this Service Account. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/secrets#manually-specifying-an-imagepullsecret)

secret.description: A list of secrets allowed to be used by pods running using this Service Account. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/secrets)

automount_service_account_token.description: Boolean, `true` to enable automatic mounting of the service account token
